document.full_text: japan's fragile post-disaster political truce unraveled on thursday as the head of the main opposition party called on unpopular prime minister naoto kan to quit over his handling of the country's natural calamities and a nuclear crisis.
document.title: calls grow for japan pm to quit in wake of quake
lines_and_colors: japan's fragile post-disaster political truce unraveled on thursday as the head of the main opposition party called on unpopular prime minister naoto kan to quit over his handling of the country's natural calamities and a nuclear crisis.
